snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said that such a recall would not improve public safety, and might exceed its authority.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Admin explains to lawmakers that recall of all Takata airbags would be imprudent and might exceed agency's authority; current recalls are limited to high-risk inflaters.
lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said that such a recall would not improve public safety, and might exceed its authority.

headline.main: Auto Safety Agency Resists Broader Recall of Takata Airbags
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Regulator Says Airbag Recall Focuses on Highest-Risk Parts
